narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Communication Station, Llp. is a Early Intervention Provider Agency provider based in Goshen, NY. From 2019-04 through 2020-03, this provider received $144K in Medicaid payments across 2K claims serving 293 beneficiaries, billing 1 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: Bills 1.6× the national median for 92507 (92507), at $78 per claim vs. the median of $49, placing them above the 75th percentile.
100% of billing is concentrated in 92507 (92507), indicating significant specialization in this service.
Billing stopped in 2020-03, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
